cssmd:property-def.description: Color of an element's text
cssmd:property-def.enum: aqua black blue fuchsia gray green lime maroon navy olive orange purple red silver teal white yellow ActiveBorder ActiveCaption AppWorkspace Background ButtonFace ButtonHighlight ButtonShadow ButtonText CaptionText GrayText Highlight HighlightText InactiveBorder InactiveCaption InactiveCaptionText InfoBackground InfoText Menu MenuText Scrollbar ThreeDDarkShadow ThreeDFace ThreeDHighlight ThreeDLightShadow ThreeDShadow Window WindowFrame WindowText inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Font used for an element's text
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit caption icon menu message-box small-caption status-bar

cssmd:property-def.description: Name of the font used for an element's text
Style of the font used for an element's text
Variant of the font used for an element's text
Size of the font used for an element's text
cssmd:property-def.syntax: length | percentage | standard font size value
cssmd:property-def.enum: xx-small x-small small medium large x-large xx-large smaller larger inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Boldness of the font used for an element's text
Decorations applied to font used for an element's text
cssmd:property-def.enum: none underline overline line-through blink inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Dynamic outline around visual objects
Width of the outline
cssmd:property-def.syntax: a unit | One of the border-width values

cssmd:property-def.description: Style of the outline
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the border-style values except hidden
cssmd:property-def.enum: dashed dotted double groove inset none outset ridge solid inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The color of the outline
cssmd:property-def.enum: aqua black blue fuchsia gray green lime maroon navy olive orange purple red silver teal white yellow invert ActiveBorder ActiveCaption AppWorkspace Background ButtonFace ButtonHighlight ButtonShadow ButtonText CaptionText GrayText Highlight HighlightText InactiveBorder InactiveCaption InactiveCaptionText InfoBackground InfoText Menu MenuText Scrollbar ThreeDDarkShadow ThreeDFace ThreeDHighlight ThreeDLightShadow ThreeDShadow Window WindowFrame WindowText inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Background of an element
Color used for an element's background
cssmd:property-def.enum: aqua black blue fuchsia gray green lime maroon navy olive orange purple red silver teal white yellow transparent ActiveBorder ActiveCaption AppWorkspace Background ButtonFace ButtonHighlight ButtonShadow ButtonText CaptionText GrayText Highlight HighlightText InactiveBorder InactiveCaption InactiveCaptionText InfoBackground InfoText Menu MenuText Scrollbar ThreeDDarkShadow ThreeDFace ThreeDHighlight ThreeDLightShadow ThreeDShadow Window WindowFrame WindowText inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Image used for an element's background
How the background image is attached to an element within the document
How the background image is tiled within an element
How the background is positioned within an element
cssmd:property-def.enum: bottom center left right top inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: How the background is positioned within an element
How the background is positioned within an element
The horizontal alignment of an element's text
The vertical alignment of an element's text
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the vertical-align values | a unit
cssmd:property-def.enum: baseline bottom middle sub super text-bottom text-top top inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The spacing between characters
The spacing between lines
The indentation of text
Letter case of the text
The spacing between words
A value that indicates whether lines are automatically broken inside the object
cssmd:property-def.enum: normal nowrap pre pre-line pre-wrap inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The display mode of an element
cssmd:property-def.enum: block inline inline-block inline-table list-item none run-in table table-caption table-cell table-column table-column-group table-footer-group table-header-group table-row table-row-group inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Edge of the object on which text will flow
Sides on which floating objects will not be allowed
The visibility of an element
The positioning mode of an element
The stacking order of a positioned element
The left edge of a positioned element
The right edge of a positioned element
The top edge of a positioned element
The bottom edge of a positioned element
Visibility of content extending beyond element's dimensions
The clipping rectangle of an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: rect([top unit] [right unit] [bottom unit] [left unit]) | auto

cssmd:property-def.description: The width of a positioned element
Constrains box width
Constrains box width
The height of a positioned element
Constrains box height
Constrains box height
The padding around all four edges of an element
The padding on the left edge of an element
The padding on the right edge of an element
The padding on the top edge of an element
The padding on the bottom edge of an element
The margin around all four edges of an element
The margin on the left edge of an element

The margin on the top edge of an element
The margin on the bottom edge of an element

The border on the bottom edge of an element

cssmd:property-def.enum: dashed dotted double groove hidden inset none outset ridge solid inherit

cssmd:property-def.syntax: a unit | inherit | One of the border-width values

cssmd:property-def.enum: dashed dotted double groove hidden inset none outset ridge solid inherit

cssmd:property-def.syntax: a unit | inherit | One of the border-width values

cssmd:property-def.description: The style of the border on the bottom edge of an element
cssmd:property-def.enum: dashed dotted double groove hidden inset none outset ridge solid inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Page breaks before an element
cssmd:property-def.enum: always auto avoid left right inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Page breaks after an element
cssmd:property-def.enum: always auto avoid left right inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Page breaks inside an element
Minimum number of lines of a paragraph to leave at the bottom of a page
Minimum number of lines of a paragraph to leave at the top of a page
Median volume of the waveform
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the volume values or any number between 0 and 100 or percentage of the inherited value
cssmd:property-def.enum: loud medium silent soft x-loud x-soft inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies whether text will be rendered aurally and in what manner
Specifies a pause before speaking an element content
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Time in milliseconds or percentage of the value of the speech-rate property

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies a pause after speaking an element content
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Time in milliseconds or percentage of the value of the speech-rate property

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies a pause before and/or after speaking an element content
Auditory icon
cssmd:property-def.syntax: none | inherit | url([url to cue image])

cssmd:property-def.description: Auditory icon
cssmd:property-def.syntax: none | inherit | url([url to cue image])

cssmd:property-def.description: Auditory icons
Sound to be played as a background while an element's content is spoken
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the play-during values or url to the sound file

cssmd:property-def.description: Spatial information
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the azimuth values or angle in -360 to 360 degrees range
cssmd:property-def.enum: behind center center-left center-right far-left far-right left left-side leftwards right right-side rightwards inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Spatial information
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the azimuth values or angle in -90 to 90 degrees range
cssmd:property-def.enum: above below higher level lower inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Speaking rate
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the speech-rate values or integer value in words per minute
cssmd:property-def.enum: fast faster medium slow slower x-fast x-slow inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Voice family
cssmd:property-def.syntax: List of comma-separated, prioritized list of voice family names

cssmd:property-def.description: Average pitch (a frequency) of the speaking voice
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the pitch values or frequency in hertz
cssmd:property-def.enum: high low medium x-high x-low inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Variation in average pitch. 50 produces normal inflection.
Height of local peaks in the intonation contour of a voice. 50 is a standard English-speaking male voice.
Richness, or brightness, of the speaking voice. Lower values produce softer voice.
Specifies how puctuation is spoken
Specifies how numerals are spoken
The bullet characteristics of a list item
The bullet style of a list item
cssmd:property-def.enum: disc circle square decimal decimal-leading-zero lower-roman upper-roman lower-greek lower-latin upper-latin armenian georgian lower-alpha upper-alpha none inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The bullet image of a list item
cssmd:property-def.syntax: none | inherit | url([url to bullet image])

cssmd:property-def.description: The bullet position of a list item
Indicates how much the counter is incremented for every occurrence of the element
Defines the value that the counter is set to on each occurrence of the element
Used with the :before and :after pseudo-elements to generate content in a document
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Text content | counter | quote values | attr(X)
cssmd:property-def.enum: close-quote no-close-quote no-open-quote normal open-quote inherit none

cssmd:property-def.description: Quotation marks for any number of embedded quotations
The direction that text flows in
The level of embedding with respect to the bidirectional algorithm
The cell layout mode of a table
The table border model
Distance that separates adjacent cell borders
Distance that separates adjacent cell borders
Distance that separates adjacent cell borders
Position of the caption box with respect to the table box
Controls rendering of borders around empty cells
Specifies whether table headers are spoken and how
The cursor over an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the cursor values | url([url to the cursor resource])
cssmd:property-def.enum: auto crosshair default e-resize help move n-resize ne-resize nw-resize pointer progress s-resize se-resize sw-resize text w-resize wait inherit

cssmd:pseudoclass-def.description: First line as formatted on the canvas
